Posts.Content: Hi .It I have been told having beast cancer when I notice a lump in my left breast.It was a chock and I still find it difficult to see my life changing the rest of my life.I am going to have my first treatment soon and I am very scared to hear about all the possible side effect. Many thanks for exchanging experience it does help to support each other as nobody knows more than people facing this rubish illness.
Posts.Title: is there a set formula on how you feel after chemo
